text: Raúl "El Gordo" De Molina (born 29 March 1959 in Cuba) is an Cuban television personality. He works with Univision Network. He hosts many positive rated Latin entertainment shows such as the news show El Gordo y la Flaca. He has won many Emmy Awards. ==References== ==Other websites== *Raúl De Molina page at Univisión.com *Página de Raúl at Univisión.com *Facebook * * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Cuban entertainers Category:Emmy Award winners Category:People from Havana Category:Television presenters
title: Raúl De Molina
